name: HR Form
body:
## Best HR form creation

### We can put all of your HR forms online and collect the completed documents safely into a database of your choice.

Searching for HR form? Just approach our organizations who have found that creating and using secure online HR forms are within their grasp.

#### Our features:
* A/B Testing
* Form Conversion
* Form Optimization
* Branch logic
* Payment integration
* Third party integration
* Push notifications
* Multiple language support
* Conditional logic
* Validation rules
* Server rules
* Custom reports

###  We empower non-technical people to create, host and capture electronic forms themselves. This saves time and money.

If you are like most HR professionals we can design [HR forms](https://formtitan.com/forms/Human-Resources) for you â€“ employment applications, employee assessments, benefit enrolment, tax forms etc.

Happy HR forms!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
